products.product_name: LED Rechargeable Torch + Hair Forceps Set (Box With Branding)

The image text describes a “Box with branding” that includes an LED rechargeable torch and a set for 2 hair forceps. The presentation shown is a folding outer 4C presentation box. The kit appears arranged in a molded inner tray for organized storage. The listing focuses on the packaged set as displayed in the creative. Any included quantity and key components are taken directly from the image label. The product is shown as a branded packaging option for the instruments in the set. For exact contents beyond what is visible in the image, please confirm the packing list.

specifications.notes: Details are taken from the text visible in the image.

products.product_title: Hair densitometer (compact instrument with own LED light source)
products.product_description: This product listing is based on the item shown in image 1.jpg. The image title clearly labels the product as a “Hair Densitometer.” The creative highlights that it is compact and has its own LED light source. It also mentions a scale for easy measurement and presents the product as functional. The visuals show the device alongside close-up measurement imagery. The listing is created from what is visible in the image and does not assume extra features beyond that. The instrument is presented as a handheld tool for hair-related measurement/assessment as indicated by the label. For any clinical claims or included accessories beyond what is shown, please provide official documentation.

products.product_title: Hydraroller: hair delivery system (0.5mm titanium needle length shown)
products.product_description: This product listing is based on the item shown in image 2.jpg. The image headline reads “Hydraroller” and “Hair delivery system.” The graphic shows a vial and a roller-style applicator in use on the scalp. The image also lists a protective cover to prevent needle contamination. It further mentions a “High quality titanium needle” with “0.5mm length” as shown on the creative. The brown bottle is described as protecting the serum from sunlight, per the image text. This listing reflects only the features stated or depicted in the image. If you want us to add exact pack contents or compatibility details, please share the official product sheet.

features_shown_on_image: Protective cover to prevent needle contamination
Brown bottle protects the serum from sunlight

products.product_title: Derma Stamp: localised microneedling with adjustable length (as shown)

The image title reads “DERMA STAMP” and the bullets mention “Localised,” “Adjustable Length,” and “microneedling.” The creative shows the device being used on the scalp and also includes a product box visual. The listing is written from the exact labels and visuals in the image. It presents the tool as a derma stamp device with adjustable length as stated. No additional medical or performance claims are added beyond what is shown. For needle counts, needle sizes, or sterilization details, please provide the manufacturer specifications. If multiple variants exist, share the variant list so we can split them correctly.

This listing only includes capabilities that are explicitly written or pictured in the image. It is presented as a hair analysis/inspection accessory as shown. For supported phone models, app requirements, or exact optical specs, please share official documentation.

The image also shows “540 needles” on the pack. It lists available needle sizes on the creative (as printed). This listing includes only the details that appear in the image. No extra claims are added beyond the visible labels. For the exact needle size variant for this specific unit, please confirm which size you sell.
